channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: As gold prices soar, this billionaire investor now has a big stake in an Alaskan gold mine
item.description: Billionaire investor John Paulson is teaming up with Canada’s NovaGold to purchase a stake in an Alaskan gold mine.

item.title: New research links golf with living longer. These golfers still swinging in their 70s agree.
item.description: The sport has a growing number of senior participants — and there’s new research that says playing the game is a longevity booster.

item.title: Worried your Social Security benefits are wrong? Here’s what to do now.
item.description: The Social Security Administration can withhold 100% of a person’s check to repay the debt

item.title: Lockheed Martin affirms outlook but doesn’t include tariff impact, and its stock falls
item.description: Lockheed beat profit expectations by a wide margin and said its $173 billion backlog represents more than two years’ worth of sales.

item.title: Tesla could see big swings on earnings. This 'Iron Condor' options trade can mitigate volatility risk
item.description: Selling an Iron Condor is an options trading strategy where you simultaneously sell out-of-the-money call spreads and put spreads.

item.title: Bank of America double upgrades this little-known sports data stock
item.description: The bank says a sports technology stock could see major gains ahead on the back of global growth in online sports betting.

item.title: Next stop for gold is $4,000, says JPMorgan
item.description: "Tariff-driven recession and stagflation risks are forecasted to continue to supercharge gold's structural bull run," analyst Gregory Shearer said.

item.title: Wells Fargo downgrades UPS, says tariffs to hit shipping volume
item.description: Wells Fargo's forecast now implies 1.8% upside from Monday's $96.25 close. Shares of UPS have pulled back nearly 24% in 2025.
